instruction: Create a pinwheel out of construction paper.
input: 3 colors of construction paper (red, blue, and yellow)
output: Fold the red construction paper in half and then unfold it. Fold the other colors in the same way. Cut out a spiral shape and glue the pieces of paper together, alternating colors. Attach the spiral's center to a cardboard circle as the base and glue a straight pin through the spiral. Push the pin through the center of the cardboard and secure it with glue. Finally, attach a pencil eraser to the center of the pin.
